comments:
Description:
Document can not be generated through runtime package.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Get runtime package.
2. Deploy birt use frameset to preview or use genReport.bat to generate document

Expected result:
Frameset servlet works ok or document can be generated.

Actual result:
NoClassDefFoundException.

Error log:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/birt/core
/archive/compound/ArchiveWriter

4)

oader.loadClass(OSGILauncher.java:634)

al(BundleLoader.java:405)

Fixed.
Add classes in archive/compound to customBuildCallbacks.xml.
